title: An 'insult.' In whirlwind Israel tour, Vance slams West Bank annexation vote
shortDescription: In a whirlwind trip to Israel to help salvage Trump's ceasefire deal, Vance weighed in on Netanyahu politics and toured the Church of the Holy Sepulchre.

title: Tourists unhappy with White House demolition
shortDescription: USA TODAY's White House Correspondent Zac Anderson spoke to tourists who flocked to the White House to get a look at the construction.

title: Will Trump cancel his Asia trip due to the government shutdown?
shortDescription: With no end in sight for the government shutdown, Trump is expected to visit Malaysia, Japan and South Korea during a multi-day trip to Asia.

title: Trump pardons convicted Binance founder Zhao, White House says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has pardoned convicted Binance founder Changpeng Zhao, a White House official said on Oct. 23.

title: Who is paying for the East Wing ballroom? See White House list.

title: Trump hits Russian oil companies with sanctions
shortDescription: President Donald Trump imposed sanctions on Russian oil companies Rosneft and Lukoil after failed talks with Vladimir Putin to end the Ukraine war.

title: Watch live: Demolition on the East Wing of the White House resumes

title: President Trump has upended the H-1B visa program | The Excerpt
shortDescription: The H-1B visa program will now cost tech companies $100,000 per application. The question is, will it motivate companies to hire American workers?

title: White House demolition sparks backlash

title: Look back at the historic White House East Wing amid demolition

title: Government shutdown live updates: Senate rejects bill to pay 'essential' workers
shortDescription: The Senate rejected both Democratic and Republican efforts to pay federal workers amid the shutdown.

title: How John Bolton's classified document charges compare to Trump's

title: NC legislature redraws districts to add GOP seats

title: Indiana Republicans don't yet have the votes to redraw districts
shortDescription: Republican Gov. Mike Braun is still confident he can pass new maps to help his party hold control of Congress.

title: Trump hits Russia with major oil sanctions

title: Trump pressures Putin with sanctions on two Russian oil companies

title: University of Virginia reaches deal with Trump administration over probes
shortDescription: The University of Virginia has reached an agreement with the Trump administration to adhere to guidance from the White House on admissions and hiring.
